BITCOIN

REAL ESTATE

Arvrtise

Arvrtise is a one stop shop for Web5 marketing with no middleman fees.Arvrtise marketing campaigns use digital ads that are airdropped to your verified wallet that allows you to re-sell the ad to your customers, fans or clients to unlock your services, products or access to your Arvrtise Discord channels.

Mission

We made real estate great again by tokenizing real-world assets (RWAs) as Bitcoin CRE. Accept Bitcoin ($RNT) to solve the housing crisis in America. Sell $RNT without involving real estate and accept $RNT payments and manage properties via Discord for free.

Benefits

Free social media story promotions and one CapCut-style meme branded commercial post per day for CRE CLUB members who hold a Bitcoin CRE property in their wallets. Membership is verified by providing a Bitcoin inscription ID as proof via DM.

Solutions

Arvrtise accepts Bitcoin Love (L$VE, $RNT, HAI$, $CBO) Cash Money donations in exchange for our solutions. This trickle-up approach empowers the creators economy, allowing our A-Team to grow as one tribe that does live business.

Bitcoin Reddit

HAHZ.ARVRTISE

As the pioneer in tokenizing commercial real estate, Wizard of Hahz has created a Bitcoin-powered Reddit platform. This platform utilizes upvotes and downvotes via Bitcoin zaps to help investors discover the hottest opportunities in commercial real estate.

Bitcoin Linkedin

DISCORD

Investors, brokers, and service providers have united to take control of their tokenized real-world assets (RWA), eliminating the middleman and enabling the sale of tokenized commercial real estate in a day rather than a year, bypassing traditional gatekeeping platforms.

Accept Bitcoin

$RNT

Accept Bitcoin $RNT with $0 fees in a branded CRE CLUB Discord channel. This allows your tenants to pay rent and submit property issues, mapped to a What3Words.com address. Service providers can then address these issues, submit proof, and receive payment in Bitcoin $RNT or L$VE.

Accept Bitcoin

MARKET.ARVRTISE

Traditional CRE marketplaces are increasing their prices and hidden fees. We offer both non-members and members a free CRE marketplace where brokers and investors can accept Bitcoin Sats (the smallest unit of Bitcoin) through our Arvrtise Market.

Custom Websites

Web Development

We build custom Arvrtise websites, marketplaces, landing pages, and branded linktree-like sites. We also create branded social media AR effects to promote your tokenized RWA (Real World Assets). For CRE CLUB members, we offer a 24-hour turnaround time for tokenizing RWA as Bitcoin.

Reel Estate

REEL ADS

We put the commercial in real estate with Reel ads that showcase real estate on social media in a cool way. TikTok is the #1 search engine for real estate, and @CRECLUB is the hottest CRE channel for investors around the world.

CRE CREtree

Linktree

Times have changed, and people are more connected to their favorite social media platforms than ever. That's why we've created CREtree, a powerful tool using Linktree to showcase CRE CLUB members' properties in a dedicated shop and display their bios and achievements in one convenient link.
